text: Tellurium(II) bromide, also known as tellurium dibromide, is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is TeBr2. It contains tellurium and bromide ions. The tellurium is in the +2 oxidation state. == Properties == Tellurium(II) bromide is a green brown crystalline solid. It absorbs water from the air. == Preparation == It is made when tellurium(IV) bromide is heated in air. It can also be made by careful reduction of tellurium(IV) bromide. == Related pages == *Tellurium(IV) chloride *Tellurium(II) chloride *Tellurium(IV) oxide Category:Tellurium compounds
title: Tellurium(II) bromide
